posts.post_content:
I have available for sale this T206 Demmitt STL SGC A for sale.  

I'm not going to insult everyone's intelligence by saying "good eye appeal", "great card", "vintage feel" etc. like many sellers do when you can clearly see their card is a dog.     This card has almost every flaw imaginable, BUT if you need a Demmitt STL to fill a spot in your collection, this one is priced right.

$500 NET to me via paypal includes shipping in the US.   Price is firm.  No trades.

[IMG]http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab239/thenavarro/img222_zps0293803e.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i867.photobucket.com/albums/ab239/thenavarro/img223_zpse133fa8d.jpg[/IMG]
Mike nice card!!! Wish I had the dough for this.

PM sent a short while ago.

Thanks

[quote name="Cozumeleno" post=1471513]PM sent a short while ago.

Thanks[/QUOTE]


Card has been sold and paid for.  Thanks Cozumeleno.

Mike

Thanks, friend ... and thanks also to Mike for making it available. I am happy to own it.

[quote name="mybuddyinc" post=1471557]Nice pick up !!!!!!!!!!!!!![/QUOTE]

Very nice pick up.  This is a Demmitt that would have actually fit my budget. Congrats on the pick up.

scott

Crap.
I would have bough that!
Nice pick-up
Was my only T206.  I'm much more into autographs than cards.
